channel.title: How do i add specials?
channel.description: Ok first, how do i add specials onto my server? Second, how do i make it so 1 dummy trains str, one def, one att, exe. Third, i added a silab item to my item.cfg list (D Bow), when i try to spawn it, it just gives me a small fishing net! I may need more help l8er too. Ty in advance!

item.title: How do i add specials?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

But most servers use 4 digit IDâ€™s.
You should either change it to a 4 digit ID or reconfigure your item codes to be compatible with 5 digit codes. I think there is a tutorial on this subject in the tutorial section.

Read full topic
